types.internalServerError: The server has encountered an error.
types.incorrectUsageError: We detected a misuse. Please read the stack trace.
types.notFoundError: The resource you requested could not be found.
types.badRequestError: The request could not be understood.
types.unauthorizedError: You are not authorized to make this request.
types.noPermissionError: You do not have the required permission to perform this request.
types.notVerifiedError: Your account is not verified. Please verify your email before proceeding.
types.validationError: The validation rules have not been met by the request.

common.invalidId: the id %s does not match the required format
common.resourceNotFound: the resource %s could not be found

authentication.notFoundOrWrong: the user could not be found or the password is wrong
